name: DOTS (itch) (ImpossibleStudios)
description:
Just a simply basic game I made. The game is a survival game where you have to not get hit by the dots. If you get hit 4 times, then you lose.

The one that plays above is a demake/prototype/demo version of the game. Sorry, but I need my game to get downloaded... but on the bright side, it has a score counter!

The instructions are in-game, but some are not said, so here are the instructions:

C - Show/Hide HP

Arrows/WASD - Movement

Click/Space - Shoot (shooting mode)
